title: What are some interesting facts about Millie Bobby Brown? - Quora

response.answer_text: 1. She was born in Malaga, Spain. She moved to Florida when she was 4. 2. She has 21 Million followers on Instagram at the age of 15. 3. Milley & Drake share a good bond with each other. 4. She is part of the Godzilla franchise for the 2019 & 2020 installment. 5. She became the youngest person ever to be included in TIME magazine's list of the 100 most influential people in the world. 6. She is the youngest person to be ever appointed as the goodwill ambassador. 7. She is the highest paid cast member on Strangers Things. She earns $ 3,00,000 per episode. 8. She loves to Rap. 9. She is born to British parents. 10. Disney TV shows helped her in making her fluent in American Accent.   Image Source: Google.
